description: Variation of Condition 1 of planning permission dated 23 July 2021 (RN: 21/02401/FULL) for the refurbishment of the existing building including relocation and provision of mechanical plant at eighth floor level and roof level, installation of photovoltaic panels and new lift overrun at roof level.  Alterations to the Carlton House Terrace elevation to facilitate wheelchair access.  Replacement of existing windows on the building and installation of acoustic louvres to the west façade at eighth floor level.  Alterations to the building undercroft including a new entrance lobby and façade lighting and CCTV.  Provision of a new cycle and waste store and loading bay.  External alterations to the adjacent piazza area including the installation of bollards, raised external area and the demised area for external seating and external lighting to the stair and passage to Carlton House Terrace; NAMELY, design alterations and use of the flat roof at rear eighth floor level as a terrace.
